project_path.Wealth: contracts/Wealth Protocol Full Smart Contract Security Audit/Wealth

findings.title: Out of gas in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The `includeInReward()` function uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the `_excluded` list, which may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is long.
